title: Strengthening Software Development Competencies: Simulation-Based Visual Display System Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational computer science/engineering knowledge and comprehension of graphic design principles
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Analyze at least three simulation display system requirements considering visual cognitive limitations
Comprehensively evaluate training effectiveness, performance metrics, and hardware constraints when selecting visual media
Independently perform over 80% of simulation visual design processes using automated decision-making tools in BYOD environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
